round_best: Develop an AI-driven platform that combines high-content image-based assays with real-time adaptive learning algorithms to autonomously modify experimental conditions based on initial cellular responses. This system would utilize machine vision to detect subtle morphological changes in cells, and apply reinforcement learning to iteratively refine the stimulus parameters (e.g., dosage, duration) to optimize desired cellular outcomes. This approach would enable highly personalized cell-based experiments and accelerate the identification of optimal conditions for therapeutic interventions.
